mapper.select: SELECT T1.PD_CD AS CODE_ID , T1.PD_NM || '(' || T1.PD_CD || ')' AS CODE_NAME , T1.PD_NM AS ABBR_NAME , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' AND T1.PD_TP_CD = 'M'
